name: Space Jumper (Eduardo Soto - sotocodes)
description:
With a minimal control scheme, control your jumper by using spacebar to jump towards mouse location, shoot, and glide. Guide the direction of shooting with your mouse. Destroy enemies to make way for you to move forward. How far can you get?

WebGL Link: http://games.sotocodes.com/SpaceJumper/

Windows and Mac standalone versions are outdated and use different control scheme.
